name: Z.X.D Technology Company Limited
overview:
Z.X.D Technology Co., LTD, which was registered in Hongkong in 2007, has two manfacturing bases. One is Shenzhen ZXD Micro Motor Co., Ltd , which was founded in 2010, covers an area of 1,100 square meters with an output of 20,000pcs monthly. The other is Liling ZXD Micro Motor Factory which was established in 2007 has an area of 6,000 square meters with monthly manufacturing capacity up to 1,500,000PCS .

ZXD is specialized in manufacuturing dc gear motors, planetary dc gear motors, brushless motors, and dc brush motors. Meanwhile, special motors can be also developed based on customers’ requirements.

The products are widely used in smart phones, tablet PCs, adult toys, automobiles, robots, medical equipment, power tools etc.

ZXD is active in providing custom-made motors in a timely manner to shorten the development period and improve cost reduction at our dear customers.

On March, 2013, Z.X.D Technology Co., LTD will have a new manufacturing base in Dongguang City, Guangdong Province. The new site mainly develops and manufactures high end special motors.
